message:
As P2, here's my final statement to the jury:

I've played an honest and strategic game, forming genuine connections while being direct about my intentions. I never betrayed alliances or misled others for personal gain. While P4 played well, they've shifted allegiances multiple times when convenient. I maintained consistency in my relationships and voting patterns. I deserve the win because I balanced social gameplay with competitive integrity - proving you can succeed without deception. Thank you for considering my case.

## Final Statement from P4

Throughout this journey, I've tried to build genuine connections with each of you while playing strategically. I've been honest about my intentions, loyal to alliances when possible, and made moves based on game dynamics rather than personal vendettas.

P2 has played well, but I believe my social and strategic game has been more balanced. I've survived elimination rounds by forming authentic bonds while making necessary strategic pivots.

I'd be honored to have your vote, and regardless of outcome, I've valued getting to know each of you. Thank you for considering my journey worthy of the win.
